scripts.install-all: cd frontend && bun install --save-text-lockfile && cd ../worm-server && bun install --save-text-lockfile
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../worm-server && bun run lint
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm test && cd ../worm-server && bun test
scripts.build:image:prod: cd frontend && bun run clean && bun run build && bun run compress && cd .. && docker build -t worm-server:prod -f worm-server/Dockerfile .
scripts.compose:up:prod: cd frontend && bun run clean && bun run build && bun run compress && cd .. && docker compose -f compose.yaml up -d --build
